1:25:25

8:52:15

8:52:24
why the system prompt matters? Well, the system prompt does not change. It's
8:52:29

14:18:25

14:18:48

16:36:10
utilize our own custom data with our AI agents and other nodes. Essentially,
16:36:16
when you use large language models, they're not trained on two things. They're not trained on newer data and
16:36:22

16:36:29
there's some simple ways that you could use rag like what I showed you with OpenAI or you can build out advanced
16:36:34
pipelines. This is a very basic pipeline. Like I'm not even saying this is great by any means and I would not
16:36:40

16:36:47
files and we have clean data and like we're not updating our data. In the real
16:36:52
world, you're going to have scenarios where there's different data types that people want to upload. there's going to be new versions of data that you're
16:36:58

16:37:03

16:37:10

16:37:17

16:37:23

16:37:29

16:37:35
